title: Am in B5 I need help
body: Aight here is the thing. I am in B5 and im sick of it. i know i can do better but the stress of the flamers are always on my back. I need someone to not boost me, but to play a ranked game with me. so they can see on wut i can improve on and wut i do good. i main mid and my second would be jg. Pls Pls Pls help me. Im not asking for boosting but i just wanna get into silver because i want the cool border thats it. If u could duo with me thats fine if u wanna boost me thats also fine but i just want to improve

replies.body: I'll play a game with ya. Add caninelegion

Don't take a boost just for the fact that you will only put yourself in a position in which you will lose more games once its over. The jump up will be hard to adjust to, and seeing yourself fall all over again will really take away your love from the game. Also if you're just looking to improve, then the reward of climbing on your own should really be a good drive for you!

I've done a bunch of coaching and I can lend you some general tips which will help you at all levels of play.

First of all write down the cooldowns of a few of the main midlaners you commonly see. Memorize them as well as you can as these are your windows of opportunity. Knowing when its safe to go in and also when they won't have anything to fight back with is huge. This is especially important for gapclosers as that is an easier kill-window. 

Time all the summoners you can remember from a fight in the ally chat. If you can communicate to your jungler that their mid is pushing you without flash theres a lot better chance he will come to gank. Secondly, it will let you know if they are able to kill you with ignite/teleport from their recall etc. Summoner spells are huge and not utilizing the window when they are down is a really big opportunity wasted!

Remember that out CSing your opponent should be your priority. If you can focus on winning CS by a decent margin you can deny the enemy in a few ways. The first of which being when you hit a signiciant milestone (Say Large Rod (1250 Gold). Neither you or your opponent have backed and he is down by 4 or more cs. If you all in him to the point where you both have to base, you will be able to buy a much more significant item and thus come back into lane stronger than your opponent. This should help you win lane from that point on due to an item advantage. (Same goes for bot lane ADC BF Sword spike!)

Communicate when your lane goes MIA! When you're farming minions and noone is there simply give a few (not just one) missing ping and think about where he is likely to go. Simply give a danger ping over an area you are suspicious of (maybe a roam bot lane/potential). Its frustrating when other lanes feed your lane,  but this should help them avoid it more often. Following that if he DOES roam bottom you need to shove your lane or rotate VERY quickly. This is situational based on how far into the roam they are and whether there is cleanup potential, but either one is a better answer than freezing as it wont deny them.

I hope these few tips help out for now. If you're looking for some more advice and feedback on your builds and masteries feel free to add me.

First: I don't want to get boosted cause i think i deserve higher elo. all i want is just that border and thats it i don't want to go higher i just want that border. 

Second: I do memorise cooldowns. Everytime i see my laner use an ability i time them i know when to go in and when to disengage i have always done that. As for sumoners spells i do type it in chat i type "champion F/Ign then the time" but i dont even think my jg cares or anyone in my game cares. remeber this is bronze half the time i play jg and i ask if someones lane has thier sums they tell me to F off cause they dont care

Third: I do try to CS so i will have to pratice on that as im not the best at CS with AP champs 

Forth: Pinging is useless in bronze. half the time the otehr lanes dont look at the minimap when someone pings mia or help or danger its only after they die that they look wheather u ping or not but still balmes u anyways so i find it redundant.

1. Look up good builds for champions. ({{item:3152}} is questionable on Viktor.
2. At the start of the game don't be afk at your tower. Stand guard for invades, drop a trinket or help your team invade.
3. You are Viktor v Yasuo. Ranged v Malee. Abuse it. Should be autoing him when you dont need the auto to cs.
4. learn how to cs under tower (practice in customs or normals)
5. learn your damage. (3:45 you missed and kill and wasted flash if you simply ignited him early or W'd behind him to force a flash)
6.  Learn lane "wave control". You have half the Yasuo's cs at 5 mins, simply because you let him push you in for free. E the minion wave and Yas at the same time to help keep it at a nice spot.
7. ok, i aint gonna watch anymore. You were afk for like 2 minutes of the 7. No.1 way to climb, pay full attention. Don;t miss CS to type to someone or whatever you were doing
Why are you giving him tips on Viktor? Did he ask for it? I'm confused by your post...
i gave him a link to my replays and i played viktor against a yasuo so now he is giving me feedback. fee free to watch my replays if u want to  :)

Hi, I just came back from winning 3 out of 3 game sin a row and here are my replays. pls give me feedback on the ones u watched ty :) http://www.replay.gg/search/oce/Oceanic%20Man (i hope its updated)

lol ok ty for the tips btw went afk cause i DC fro a second and ill have to look into that viktor guide as i rarely play agsint a yasuo and i dont rly know how to lane with him. About that thing of using E to the minions onto yasuo. I dont rly know much mana control an didnt want to spam my skills and force my self to back. and about the flashing and igniting i had already used my W but didnt have enough time to kill him. TY for the tips tho

There are quite a few things you can do to improve your game  ♥

You could hire a coach:
**[Purplesidegg](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/EV6P9OEw-coaching)** (diamond) and **[best khazix oce](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=26126)** (diamond/master) both offer A+ coaching for your roles at reasonable rates. 
In terms of free coaching, [**Litharrale**](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=61956) is probably the highest ranked coach for free unless you find somone here on the boards. 


[Create/join a premade team](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) (less toxicity and more communication leads to better games)

You could get in touch with Yasei Doubutsu, who is a player in gold who analyses bronze games on his [youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ). He can advise you on the best way to record a game and send it to him so he can give feedback. 

And to top it all off, you could check out a bunch of league guides on the small stuff, 
  
* [like achieving challenger level cs,](https://www.pinterest.com/pin/439734351096970489/)
*   [good warding](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/support-guide-map-control-warding-344910)
*  [playing from behind](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JANDrSBf1Cw)
*  much, much more 

Good luck ♥
Check out some of my games on here http://www.replay.gg/search/oce/Oceanic%20Man there are replays of my games but not all updated

If you have LoLReplay you can send me your game files and go over them.
If not, I can spectate your games and see if I can help that way if you'ed like.
